member.name: T:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.OAuth2Api
member.summary: Class containing methods for OAuth2 authentication.

member.name: M:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.OAuth2Api.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the OAuth2Api class using the default endpoint base url for the services being accessed.

member.name: M:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.OAuth2Api.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the OAuth2Api class using an endpoint base url other than the default. Use this constructor only if you should need to override the default endpoint base url.
member.param: The endpoint base url for the services being accessed.

member.name: M:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.OAuth2Api.GetOAuth2AuthorisationUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the authorization URL where the browser will be directed givent the consumer key of the app and a redirect Url.
member.param: The consumer (API) key of the application.
member.returns: The authorization URL where the browser will be directed.

member.name: M:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.OAuth2Api.GetResponseKey(System.Uri)
member.summary: Gets the Response Key from the OAuth flow contained in the user redirection back to the application. This must be exchanged for an Access Token.

member.name: M:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.OAuth2Api.GetAccessTokenResponse(System.String)
member.summary: Exchanges the response key for an access token.
member.returns: Information containing the access token and other details about the user's product account.

member.name: M:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.OAuth2Api.DirectLogin(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Direct Login Generates an access token from user credentials.
member.returns: Information containing the access token and other details about the user's product account.
member.exception: If an error occurred during the access token generation.

member.name: M:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.OAuth2Api.GetAccessTokenUsingRefreshToken(System.String)
member.summary: Exchanges the refresh token for an access token.
member.param: The refresh token from the access token response.
member.returns: The refresh token from the access token response.
member.exception: If an error occurred during exchanging the refresh token for an access token.

member.name: P:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.OAuth2Api.Invoker
member.summary: Gets the API invoker

member.name: P:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.OAuth2Api.BasePath
member.summary: Gets the endpoint base url for the services being accessed

member.name: T:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Common.ApiException
member.summary: The exception thrown when an API error occurs.

member.name: M:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Common.ApiException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ApiException class.

member.name: M:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Common.ApiException.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ApiException class.
member.param: The status code of the error that occured. Can be HTML status code or another number for other types of exceptions.

member.name: M:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Common.ApiException.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ApiException class.
member.param: The status code of the error that occured. Can be HTML status code or another number for other types of exceptions.

member.name: M:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Common.ApiException.#ctor(System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ApiException class.

member.name: P:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Common.ApiException.ErrorCode
member.summary: Gets the status code of the error that occurred. Can be HTML status code or another number for other types of exceptions.

member.name: M:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Model.TokenResponse.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representing the current object.
member.returns: The Json serialization of the current object.

member.name: P:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Model.TokenResponse.access_token
member.summary: Oauth access token

member.name: P:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Model.TokenResponse.expires_in
member.summary: Expiration time in seconds (typically 356 days)

member.name: P:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Model.TokenResponse.refresh_token
member.summary: The token to use to obtain a new access token, for example, if the current access token has expired. The refresh token is valid for 13 months.

member.name: P:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Model.TokenResponse.organizer_key
member.summary: GoTo product user organizer key

member.name: P:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Model.TokenResponse.account_key
member.summary: GoTo product account key (may be blank)

member.name: P:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Model.TokenResponse.account_type
member.summary: GoTo product type, i.e. personal or corporate (may be missing or blank)

member.name: P:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Model.TokenResponse.firstName
member.summary: GoTo product user organizer first name

member.name: P:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Model.TokenResponse.lastName
member.summary: GoTo product user organizer last name

member.name: P:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Model.TokenResponse.email
member.summary: GoTo product user organizer email

member.name: P:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Model.TokenResponse.version
member.summary: The version of the access token

member.name: P:LogMeIn.GoToCoreLib.Api.Model.TokenResponse.token_type
member.summary: The type of token

member.summary: GoTo product type, i.e. personal or corporate (may be missing or blank)
